generated.css: *{margin:0;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif}.decks{margin:50px auto;display:grid}@media (min-width:425px){.decks{width:400px}}.decks-heading{color:red;font-size:30px;text-shadow:1px 1px 1px grey;margin-bottom:20px;text-align:center;margin-left:30px}.deck{text-decoration:none;cursor:pointer;color:#2c2c28;text-shadow:0 0 1px red}.list{list-style-type:none;margin-bottom:20px;display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;padding:10px;grid-gap:100px;border:none;border-bottom:1px solid #ff0;box-shadow:none}.study-box{width:300px;display:grid;grid-template-rows:2fr 2fr 1fr;margin:60px auto}.details{margin-bottom:20px}.count{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;grid-gap:100px}.study-box .heading{text-align:left;color:red;font-size:30px;text-shadow:1px 1px 1px grey}.study-box .study-btn{width:100px;padding:3px;border-radius:6px;background-color:#2c2c28;color:#fff;font-weight:700;font-size:15px}.showQuestion-box{display:grid;grid-template-rows:10fr 1fr;margin:50px auto}@media (min-width:768px){.showQuestion-box{width:500px}}.answer-btns{display:flex}.answer-btns .btn,.showQuestion-box .study-btn{width:100px;margin:0 auto;border-radius:6px;background-color:#636331;height:40px;color:#fff;font-weight:700}.showAnswer-box .showAnswer,.showQuestion-box .showQuestion{margin:0 auto}.showAnswer-box{display:grid;grid-template-rows:7fr 1fr 1fr;margin:50px auto}@media (min-width:768px){.showAnswer-box{width:500px}}.showAnswer-box .timings{margin-top:28px;display:flex;justify-content:space-around}.edit-btn{text-align:center;display:block;cursor:pointer;color:#884b4b;width:50px;text-shadow:0 0 1px red;font-size:15px;background-color:#fff;margin:-20px auto;font-weight:700;border:1px solid grey;box-shadow:2px 2px 2px #993f3f}.congrats-msg{color:green;width:500px;margin:60px auto;font-size:20px}.dropdown-box{max-width:70px;position:relative;justify-self:end}.dropdown-content{background-color:#dbbdbd;position:absolute;display:none;z-index:1;box-shadow:2px 2px 2px grey}.dropdown-box:hover .dropdown-content{display:block}.dropdown-content label:hover{background-color:#cf9e9e}.dropdown-content label{display:flex;position:relative;color:#2c2c28;text-shadow:0 0 1px red;padding:10px}.dropdown-btn{text-decoration:none;cursor:pointer;color:#2c2c28;text-shadow:0 0 1px red}
